R

RandomEvent - Class in monsterfighter.core
Class that models random events that can occur when a player rests in the monster fighter application
RandomEvent(ArrayList<Monster>) - Constructor for class monsterfighter.core.RandomEvent
Constructs the random events that may occur when the player rests.
receiveDamage(int) - Method in class monsterfighter.core.Monster
Decreases the monsters current health by the given amount.
receiveHealth(int) - Method in class monsterfighter.core.Monster
Heals the monster by increasing the current health by the given amount.
removeItemFromInventory(Item) - Method in class monsterfighter.core.Player
Removes an Item from the corresponding ArrayList in the players inventory.
removeMonsterFromParty(Monster) - Method in class monsterfighter.core.Player
Removes a Monster from the party.
removeObject(Purchasable) - Method in class monsterfighter.core.Shop
Removes the given object from the shop.
removeTrainerBattle(Battle) - Method in class monsterfighter.core.Battles
Removes a TrainerBattle from the TrainerBattle's list.
removeWildBattle(Battle) - Method in class monsterfighter.core.Battles
Removes a WildBattle from the wildBattles list.
resetWins() - Method in class monsterfighter.core.Monster
Resets the monsters daily win counter to zero.
revive(int) - Method in class monsterfighter.core.Monster
Sets the monster's status to Monster.Status.CONSCIOUS and heals the monster by a given amount
rewards(Battle) - Method in class monsterfighter.core.GameEnvironment
Gives the player their rewards from the battle
